channel.title: People can't connect to my server other than me... any help?
channel.description: Well... I tried posting my server on Moparscape/RuneLocus server status's and it wouldn't let me, it said that my server had to be ONLINE but it was OFFLINE at the time... i tried over and over, searched on Google.com/Ask.com/Moparscape and even YouTube to find why, but nothing came up. My server WAS running at the time i tried to post it, and i could log on my computer as well. I don't believe anyone else can access my server either. If you have any suggestions or links to places i could go to fix this... i would be greatly appreciated!

item.title: People can't connect to my server other than me... any help?
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2 kid2kewl2
item.description:
@kid2kewl2 wrote:

Well… According to about 4 other videos i just watched i portforwarded correctly… so i don’t know. Do you have teamviewer? Maybe you could help me with that if you do.

Read full topic
